message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,100,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $950,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $950,000 is unfortunately too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit further to $1,050,000. This reflects a fair compromise considering the value of the product to both of us. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, $1,050,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'll offer $1,025,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product to me.
